indicator_name: Proportion of positions in public institutions
graph_title: Proportion of positions in public institutions
goal_name: 16. Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
target_name: 16.7 Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
indicator_name1: 16.7.1.a Proportion of positions in public institutions
organization_name: National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Labour and Employment Statistics Division)
definitions: The proportion of people employed in political, special and administrative positions in government institutions is calculated in relation to the number of civil servants in government bodies.
data_sources: State statistical reporting in the form No. 1-GOS (brief) Report on the number of employees employed in government agencies as of January 1
data_collection:
Data collection is carried out in the form of state statistical reporting No. 1-GOS (brief). The form is represented by independent (having the right of a legal entity) institutions and organizations registered in the Unified State Register of Legal Entities as public administration bodies. 
Government bodies after the reporting year on paper - to the territorial statistical bodies at their location or in electronic format - to the National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic.
Data is collected on an annual basis.
computation_methods: To calculate this indicator, data on the number of civil servants in government agencies for all positions is required. We also need a breakdown of the number of civil servants by their government positions (political, special and administrative).
data_availability_gaps: Data on age, length of service and disability are available in the State Personnel Service of the Kyrgyz Republic
references_documentation:
The National SDG Reporting Platform of the Kyrgyz Republic: https://sustainabledevelopment-kyrgyzstan .github.io
They are published in the statistical collection Women and Men of the Kyrgyz Republic""
